name: Andrio Pratama Sirait
about: Experienced Full-Stack Developer from Indonesia with over 5 years of experience. Start-Up Co-founder and currently working for an IT consulting company. Highly skilled in TypeScript, JavaScript, and PHP. Expertise in Web, Android, and iOS platforms. Successfully delivered multiple projects. Driven by a passion to consistently deliver excellence through coding and technology.
hobbies: Enjoy playing video games a little while to refresh myself from the exhausting coding. Also enjoy watching video on YouTube
